name: Sülüğen Kılıç
desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Kırık Çinisi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Kaos Cihazı
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Yıkık Duvarı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Kaos Cihazı
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Yıkık Duvarı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Kaos Devresi
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no one is able to make sense of how it worked.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Destansı Parçası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Kaos Devresi
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no one is able to make sense of how it worked.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Destansı Parçası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Kaos Çekirdeği
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Decarabian'ın Rüya Parçası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

materials.name: Kaos Çekirdeği
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

value.text: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

value.name: Alkahest
value.desc:
Specialized refinement material for the Cinnabar Spindle.
A silver substance shining with an otherworldly light that is a deadly corrosive poison to things of this world. And yet it also has the power to sublimate matter...

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: Kreideprinz olarak bilinen bir dahi. Favonius Şövalyelerinin Soruşturma Ekibinin Baş Simyageri ve Yüzbaşısı.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>This weapon increases DEF and has a special effect that increases Elemental Skill DMG based on DEF, thereby increasing Albedo's Elemental Skill DMG.</color>

desc.text:
Separate the dust in the flames with joy, and extract the exquisite from the crude.
For all in the universe comes from a single source, and all things may be derived from a single thought.
You must pursue that which your elder brother, the one-horned white horse, could not accomplish.
Reach the far side of philosophy, and create a new destiny for myself and your brothers...
